title: nannu brOva rAdA O
sahitya:
nannu brOva rAdA O jagadambA nI dayacEyavE


anupallavi

  kanna talli nIvE ambA nA moralanu vinarAdA


caraNam 1    Adi shakti mahEshvarI kaumArI AdarimpavE vEvEgamE nIlAyatAkSI bhavAni
    caraNam 2    kOmaLa mrdu vANI kalyANI sOmashEkharuni rANi lalitAmbikE varadE
    caraNam 3    shyAmakrSNa sahOdarI OmkArI shAbhavI O jananI nAdarUpiNI naLinAkSI
